meanings.sent1: The tall trees begulfed the small cabin in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The thick fog begulfed the entire town, making it hard to see.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy blanket begulfed the sleepy cat, making it purr contentedly.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the night begulfed the city, hiding all its secrets.
meanings.sent5: The warm embrace of the sun begulfed the children playing in the park.

meanings.sent1: The loud music begulfed the room, drowning out all other sounds.
meanings.sent2: The huge wave begulfed the tiny boat, causing it to capsize.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of the bakery begulfed the street, tempting everyone to buy pastries.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of joy begulfed her heart, making her smile uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The sense of relief begulfed him when he finally found his lost keys.
